content: the pattern for these cute knitted baby pixie hats is available on my blog for free in size 0-3 months 3-6 months and 6-12 months the hats are made in drops nepal an aran weight yarn in 35% alpaca and 65% wool the yarn is soft and non-itchy i use 5 mm double pointed needles for the hats you can make up the colour ways yourself i tend to make them so they match the colours of my crochet noella baby booties please respect copyright and share photos if you make the hats
